title: QST - Quit Smoking Tracker
subtitle: Smoke-Free Life Monitoring
fullDescription: QST is your comprehensive guide to quitting smoking, with easy-to-track progress, motivational milestones, and financial insights that highlight the benefits of your journey to quit smoking. Track how long you've been smoke-free, see how much you've saved, and monitor your health improvements over time.
Progress Tracking: Track your days smoke-free, see immediate benefits, and stay motivated with key health milestones.
Money Saved Calculator: Watch your savings grow by seeing how much you've saved since quitting smoking based on your smoking habits.
Personalized Health Timeline: See your body's recovery stages with a detailed timeline that covers improvements in health, energy, and overall well-being.
QST is more than just a tracker; it's your partner in leading a healthier, smoke-free life. Quit smoking, save money, and rediscover your best self with QST!

title: Capsula - Digital Time Capsule
subtitle: Add and lock text and images
metaDescription: Capsula is an app that allows users to create and store digital capsules of text and photos, which can be opened on a specific date in the future.
fullDescription: Capsula is an app that allows users to create and store digital capsules of text and photos, which can be opened on a specific date in the future.
- Create and customize digital capsules with text and images.
- Set a future opening date for your capsules.
- Sync your capsules across all your devices with iCloud.

The app features seamless iCloud synchronization, allowing users to access their capsules across multiple devices signed in with the same Apple Account. Whether you want to preserve a special moment, send a message to your future self, or create a time capsule for loved ones, Time Capsule makes it easy and enjoyable.
With a strong emphasis on privacy and security, all user data is stored locally on the device and in iCloud using encryption, ensuring that your content remains private and secure.
Get Capsula today and start preserving your memories for the future!
